executor_binder::executor_binder (1 of 9 overloads)

Construct an executor wrapper for the specified object. 

template<
    typename U>
executor_binder(
    executor_arg_t ,
    const executor_type & e,
    U && u);

This constructor is only valid if the type T is constructible from type U.
